title: 28: No Such Thing As A Man-Eating Clam
content: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Anna (@nosuchthing), and Andy (@andrewhunterm) discuss washing with wine, dogs eating homework, counting with your loins, and all things clammy...
